storyInfo: With the crisis averted, the party can finally relax and explore Rhodes Island, cook a feast full of memories, and share it with everyone aboard.

attributes.content: (Howl of anger)
attributes.name: Ceobe?

attributes.content: What magic should I use here... It feels like no matter what I go for, it'll hurt Kayâ€”
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Please, help me keep her still! I'll calm her down!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Easy for you to say, but she's being a real terror without a leash!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Senshi, do we still have any of that popcorn left over?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Aye.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Try throwing some of it for her to eat!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Before he even finishes speaking, Senshi reaches into his sack for a ball of popcorn and lobs it at Ceobe.
Ceobe stares at it as if entranced, her anger placated.
I knew it! She's looking for something to eat!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Maybe something she ate on her journey upset her stomach and made her this way!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Since when do people turn into monsters when they get a stomachache?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit once told me that Kay comes from a special bloodline, so that might actually be possible.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you serious?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Save the talk for later! Let's get her under control while she's distracted!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You, with the sword! You, with the pot on your back! You two look strong; let's hold her down together.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Laios & Senshi

attributes.content: The three of them sneak behind Ceobe while she happily munches on popcorn. With all their might, they each grab one of her legs firmly.
(Unhappy howling)
attributes.name: Ceobe?

attributes.content: Now, Amiya!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Come back to us, Kay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't be scared. You're safe at home right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Pained howl)
attributes.name: Ceobe?

attributes.content: Amazing... I've never seen magic like that before.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Look, Kay's back!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oh, thank goodness!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Kay! are you alright?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm...? Wha... what happened...?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: It's like I was... dreaming!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Dreaming?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Ceobe looks around her. The once neat-and-tidy room is now in utter shambles. Her hand is still curled around half a broken toy.
I'm sorry... Vulcan told me if I do something bad, I have to say sorry, and it looks like I did something bad...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I was real hungry in my dream, and my tummy kept rumbling... and then...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: And then...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And then I grew lots of heads, and I wanted to eat a whole bunch of things!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: All I had to do was eat until I was full, then I'd be real happy, and I'd come back here!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (Whispers) Matterhorn, where's Vulcan? Has she noticed anything about Kay recently?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Whispers) I'll go ask her once we're done here.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (Whispers) So, what should we do with her now?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ...*rumble*...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Oh? Hungry again?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Yep!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I wanna eat lots and lots!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I was full in my dream, but now I'm hungry again!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Kay, do you know of a monster with three heads?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Of course I know!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: What do you know about it?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It doesn't just have three heads, it's got a thousand!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Every time I wanna eat lots and lots, I grow ten, a hundred... no, a thousand heads! That's why I can never get enough!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I've got a thousand heads!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: You what?!
attributes.name: Laios's Party

attributes.content: Well, as long as my tummy's full, I won't become like how I was just now!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Well then! I'll cook you up a proper meal right away!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: We'll make an exception to the 'no snacks before a meal' rule. We do need to bring her in for a medical exam, though.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now, friends from afar, why don't you take a stroll around Rhodes Island? This might be a bit much to ask, but I was hoping you could show off your cooking skills once more at mealtime.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: S-Sure, thanks...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: As for the other reason you sought us out...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We might need some time to know your circumstances before we can figure out how to get you home.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh... So, what do we do now?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I wouldn't worry too much. The Doctor and Dr. Kal'tsit might be able to find a way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yes. Whatever the case, you did help Kay, and your situation is... rather peculiar.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you like, you can stay on Rhodes Island for a while.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As our representative, allow me to welcome you all aboard.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: More newbies? Which department are they under?
attributes.name: Curious Operator A

attributes.content: Weird, can't tell what race they are. They hiding their tails or something?
attributes.name: Curious Operator B

attributes.content: I saw a young lady carrying a whole lot of crops just now. Mind showing me your farms here?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Farms... Do you mean Horticulture and Hydroponics, that kind of thing? Follow me.
attributes.name: Curious Operator A

attributes.content: You guys got an inn here?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Oh, so you're a Durin! C'mon, it's this way.
attributes.name: Curious Operator B

attributes.content: Do you... do you have anywhere I could take a proper bath and comb my hair?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Of course, dear, the dorms have all you need. Just follow me!
attributes.name: Curious Operator C

attributes.content: Oh, such long rabbit ears! I wasn't able to get a good look at their capillary distribution last time. What a shame...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wow, they can adjust the position of their tails to maintain their balance. Ingenious...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hmm... Some clearly have feathers, but they have no wings. Can they fly?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Ah, this place really is heaven...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh, isn't he one of the new operators they were talking about? He looks a bit lost, standing in the middle of the corridor like that. Do you think he's too embarrassed to ask for directions?
attributes.name: Curious Operator D

attributes.content: Maybe he's a bit shy. Why don't we start the conversation?
attributes.name: Curious Operator E

attributes.content: Hello! Do you happen to beâ€”
attributes.name: Curious Operator E

attributes.content: (Whispers) Do these birdmen lay eggs? If they're unfertilized, then can I see how one tastes? With this many people on board, surely I can get a few...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Whispers) Can goatman hair be knitted into sweaters? The ones I saw earlier had bare arms though, doesn't seem like they grow wool. A shame...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Whispers) But what I really want to know is, if a catman and a dogman have a child, would they be a cat or a dog? Or maybe they're half-cat half-dog? ...Maybe the top is a cat and the bottom is a dog? Or maybe it's split left and right instead?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Whispers) ...What if it's with a birdman? Would they lay an egg that hatches into a cat? Hmm...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Curious Operators

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Curious Operators

attributes.content: (Collectively step back)
attributes.name: Curious Operators

attributes.content: Oh, hello.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Collectively take another step back)
attributes.name: Curious Operators

attributes.content: Can I ask you a question...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Collectively take yet another step back)
attributes.name: Curious Operators

attributes.content: Do you lay eggs?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.options: Me? I certainly do not.;She certainly does not.;He wasn't asking you, Mon3tr. No need to come out.

attributes.content: Hmm? Oh! Sorry, I was asking those birdâ€”err, Liberi... Huh? Where'd they go?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Why's everyone standing so far away from me?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya! That's him! That's the guy I was telling you about!
attributes.name: No-Longer-Curious Operator D

attributes.content: He's no patient, he's one of those... 'guests' we found waking up on the deck!
attributes.name: No-Longer-Curious Operator E

attributes.content: He-he-he's been asking us all sorts of dreadful questions, over and over again!
attributes.name: No-Longer-Curious Operator F

attributes.content: Ah... What sort of questions?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He asked us if our children would be half-cat half-dog!
attributes.name: No-Longer-Curious Operator D

attributes.content: He asked if Liberi could lay eggs, and if he could eat them!
attributes.name: No-Longer-Curious Operator E

attributes.content: (Hiss)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Oh, my, what a magnificent one. You're called Mon3tr, right?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Can I touch you?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Piercing cry)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Nimble motion)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Wh-Whoa?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wow! How do you keep your hair so golden and shiny when you spend most of your time in a dangerous dungeon? Without any good haircare either!
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Heheh! It's all because of how important hair is to a magician. I store some of my mana in it.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Here. This is one of my favorite hair creams. It has perfume and herbal extracts mixed in, and it'll keep your hair moisturized and protected.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: The only reason my hair is as sleek as it is now is thanks to frequent application!
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Wow, it smells great!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If you'd like a change of pace in your hairstyle, I've got lots of braiding tips I can show you!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Where. Do. You. Think. You're. Going?
I was justâ€”
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: What were you doing with my flames?
Uh...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I said, what were you doing with my flames?!
...Roasting some chestnuts...
attributes.name: Senshi
Skyfire
attributes.content: Roasting.

attributes.name: Skyfire
attributes.content: Some.

attributes.name: Skyfire
attributes.content: Chestnuts!
Roasting some chestnuts.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The lass driving the tractor gave me a bushel of raw ones, said they were the first harvest of chestnuts she managed to grow on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You manage your farms well. Chestnuts make a mighty fine snack. They get soft and sweet after roasting, and their shells become easy to peel too.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Pity the fire coming off your body was too hot! Ended up burning 'em all. I said I'd cook a meal for you, but I never expected to waste perfectly good ingredients like that. Real shameful behavior, if you ask me...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Skyfire, please calm down!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Ahh! Shaw, Shaw! Come quick! Skyfire's catching fire again!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Mister, please don't cook anything else on her, especially not those kebabs!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: *gulp*!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Not half bad.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Phew. Anyway, like I said, I'm not a Durin.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Wait, you're not?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: You're not a child then, are you?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Mind sitting down when we talk? I can't see your face.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I am sitting down.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Care for another?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: My thanks.
attributes.name: SilverAsh

attributes.content: Are all the men here this tall? Even Laios seems a bit short compared to you guys...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Whispers) This guy covered in silvery-white hair... If Laios saw him, I bet the only thing he'd be thinking about is asking him if he'd like some help combing it all...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ah, whatever.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: A drinking party? Without me?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I know it's been a while, but did all of you really forget to ask me?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmm? Hey, what's with the kid? Kids shouldn't be drinking.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: *gulp*
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: *sniffsniffsniff*
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (Something smells really good!)
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (Maybe they finished cooking?)
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (Tasty food's here!!)
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Let's gooooo!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: My backâ€”
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: (Uh-oh, I hit someone...)
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Sorry!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Vulcan told me if I ran into someone, I have to say sorry.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Sorry, Mister Beard! I ran into you 'cause I was hungry!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: It's fine, come help me put it all on the table!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: A meal made with the ingredients and memories given to us by the folks we met along the way. 'Tis done!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Come have a bite. Do they all taste like they did before?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hmm... I wanted to ask earlier while we were preparing the ingredients, but why are we making the exact same dishes we had on our journey?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Does repeating the same recipe make you feel better?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...That, I can't say for sure. But if it's got the same taste, then I'll think back to the first time I had it, and what was going through my mind at the time.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Like if I said 'scorpion hotpot,' what's the first thought that comes to mind, Marcille?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: ...The first time I met you in the Beginners' Plaza.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Walking mushroom feet are both edible and tasty, with a unique aroma.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Scorpions are a pain to cut into bits.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: What about that basilisk?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You saying you had to cook the antidote herb with the chicken for that adventurer so it'd taste better...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Basilisks are really cool!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille finally getting to eat that chicken she was craving.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Then, mandrake?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Very unique heads!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille and that big batâ€”
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We can skip over that one, okay?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: See? That's what I mean.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Food is connected to memory. When you eat something you've had before, your brain automatically goes back to the other times you've had it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It's the same when I cook. I think of the people I first made the dish with. Why did we choose to make it? Did we learn anything new while preparing the ingredients? Any happy smiles after we were done eating?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: This way, the aroma and flavor can recreate the scene in your mind, bit by bit.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: As for the meal we're about to have? That gets to be a new memory, to be brought up during future dinners.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You've always had a way with words, Senshi.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Alright, enough prattle! Let's eat!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Chow time!
attributes.name: Overjoyed Laios's Party

attributes.content: Mmm. These carrots are perfect! Would you like to try some, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't want any roast Originium slug? Really? It's delicious.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Not even one shell?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wow... Can I really eat this?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: All of it?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: All of it!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yippee! You are so kind!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Oh, right... 'Doctor,' was it? Just noticed you there.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: While we were cooking, the operators told me you're often so busy with work that you forget to eat.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And when you do remember, it's some hastily-thrown-together slop, on top of unhealthy wake-me-ups or empty calories just to fill your stomach.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hardly what I'd call a good attitude to health! There's plenty of people worried about you!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.options: It's not quite that bad...;Yeah, that sounds like me.;Roast Originium slug's pretty tasty.

attributes.content: Doctor, if you want to get strong, you need a good work-life balance, to eat three square meals a day, and to get some exercise! Got that?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Thanks for helping us out, Doctor. The same goes to everyone at Rhodes Island. I've made a lot of new friends here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If only Falin were here too...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: After we're done eating, could you give us a detailed overview of this land?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What? Why're you staring at me, Doctor? What, you want a drink? Well, it's not that you can't, it's just... Are you an adult yet?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I really can't tell with that mask on...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Oh, this is delicious!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I need to note down the recipe. We've got to make it for Falin once we save her!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'll have to tell her all about the journey we went on to save her, about all the lovely people we met along the way, and all the memories we made...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'm sure she'll love hearing about it!
attributes.name: Marcille
